top_comment.text:
I remember getting hooked immediately just because of the name's pun lol.
Taeyang (태양) = Sun; Tae-yang = Ms. Tae (Gong Shil).
Joogun (주군) = Master; Joo-gun = Mr. Joo (Jung Won).
So, "Joogun ui Taeyang" (주군의 태양) = Master's Sun. And in the last episode, 
Mr. Joo saved Ms. Tae's number as "Jugeum ui Taeyang"
Where Jugeum (죽음: Death) kinda sound like Joogun (주군: Master).
Meaning, "Jugeum ui Taeyang" (죽음의 태양) = Death's Sun... After all Ms. Tae 
did shine brightly for the dead people right? xD﻿
top_comment.author: eruaru

comments.text: LOL THATS COOL!
comments.author: Grace Kwan

comments.text:
So yeah, "Master's Sun" can be directly translated to "Mr. Joo's Miss Tae" 
lol.

comments.text:
I haven't watched Heirs yet and I don't wanna judge it just for its plot so 
now that I have finished Master's Sun :'( I'll watch Heirs, but I still 
doubt that Heirs will be better than MS, I mean the plot, the acting, the 
ghosts (some of them were really scary while others were funny like the 
coffee ghost), the comedy (how amazing is that So Ji Sub can make you laugh 
with his poker face XD), the chemistry of the main characters, the music, 
Sweet Kang is a really sweet guy that you end up doubting if Tae Yang 
should stay with him instead of the Master xD, So Ji Sub himself is a good 
reason to re watch this drama a million times he's super handsome, super 
cute!!!! Heirs must the something amazing for me to like it more than 
Master's Sun, which I still doubt it XD
comments.author: hyugaUkyo

comments.text:

captions.text:
I am angry, I am. 
You're fired

Get out of my 
face forever
Go away

Will you make you happy 
if I call your name three times?

Joo Jung Won,
Joo Jung Two

Joo Jung three.
Joo Jung three.

When you brush 
by my hand

The cold heart 
becomes warm

I want to get closer 
to you and rest

But the distance between
us  doesn't go away

It’s okay even if 
I can’t touch you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t hold you

Lonely love 
Yes I love you

I can feel you 
like my destiny
My heart can get to you

I want to hold out 
my hands and hold you

But I can’t because 
you might go away

I just linger around
you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t love you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t reach you

Lonely love 
Yes I love you

I can see you even from
Far away

It’s okay even if 
I can’t touch you

It’s okay even if 
I can’t hold you

Lonely love
Yes I love you

I can feel you 
like my destiny
My heart can get to you
Lonely love

Touch Love 
t, Yoonmirae

title: [MV] t Yoonmirae(t 윤미래) _ Touch love (터치 러브) (Master`s sun(주군의 태양) OST Part 4)
